constraints.name: degree_fixed
constraints.description: 指定节点的度数固定为 K（生成树中特定节点的边数约束）

constraints.name: spanning_tree
constraints.description: 结果必须是生成树（连通且无环）
constraints.formal: T is a spanning tree of G

constraints.name: min_weight_sum
constraints.description: 生成树的边权总和最小（最小生成树约束）
constraints.formal: minimize Σ w(e) for e in T
